title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze basic rocket propulsion equations and demonstrate understanding through problem-solving.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Evaluate different combustion processes and compare performance characteristics of propellants.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a rocket nozzle using provided mission constraints and calculate efficiency.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Answer theoretical and practical questions on subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behavior.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Conduct analysis of airflow over aerospace surfaces and interpret computational results.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Examine thermal loads on re-entry vehicles and assess appropriate heat shielding techniques.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Develop a basic structural layout for a spacecraft considering material and load constraints.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Solve orbital mechanics problems and simulate spacecraft maneuvers for mission planning.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Test your understanding of spacecraft system design, integration, and mission architecture.
